name: GOTO START;
description:
!DO NOT RESIZE THE BROWSER WINDOW!

Made in 72 hours for ludumdare 47
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/goto-start

GOTO START;

goto start is a deck building game where you have to find and fight the infinite loop at the heart of your program. Collect cards and battle functions so you can stop the goto function before you get a stack overflow!
I had @YaboiMatoi assist with music!

Me and my usual team is also currently making a full version of our Previous LudumDare submission Socket Punch! https://twitter.com/socketpunch check it out here!
